text: Koraa, â€˜ami allahara oparata arau amara prati yi aratirna haiche arau ibraahima, ichama'ila, ichahakba, iyakbuba arau te'omra bansadharasakalara prati yi aratirna haichila arau yi mucha, icha arau ana ana nabisakalaka te'omlokara pratipalakara taraphara paraa pradana karaa haichila tara oparata imana anicho; ami te'omlokara karao majata kono parthakya nakarao; arau ami te'omra ocarate'i atmasamarpanakarai
